meanings.definition: A small terrestrial crustacean with a segmented body and fourteen legs, commonly found in damp environments.
meanings.sent1: I saw a woodlouse crawling slowly on the wet ground.
meanings.sent2: The woodlouse curled up into a ball when I touched it.
meanings.sent3: The woodlouse decided to take a stroll in the rain, carrying a tiny umbrella.
meanings.sent4: The woodlouse moved like a tiny armored tank through the garden.
meanings.sent5: The woodlouse's many legs made it look like a tiny centipede.

meanings.definition: A woodlouse is also known as a pill bug or roly-poly.
meanings.sent1: My little sister found a woodlouse and called it a roly-poly.
meanings.sent2: We learned in science class that a woodlouse is the same as a pill bug.
meanings.sent3: The woodlouse, also known as a pill bug, rolled down the hill like a tiny ball.
meanings.sent4: The children giggled as the woodlouse performed its acrobatics, also known as a roly-poly.
meanings.sent5: The woodlouse, or pill bug, was the star of the bug show at the school.
